hi Scott,

you can inspect the crawl log directly to see if images
are being downloaded. and if you're using the web UI,
you can look at the log reports.

a colleague just crawled 100 URLs from "www.cnn.com" with
Heritrix 1.14.3 and found 230 GIFs and 174 JPGs in the
logs, most of which came from "cdn.turner.com".

have you changed your scope to remove the default
*transclusion* of offsite inline images?


/steve@...
